name: Yoga Training - Daily Yoga Poses for everyone
name_original: Yoga Training - Daily Yoga Poses for everyone
description:
Start yoga now!
Yoga Training v1.0 presents yoga exercises for every age people to learn yoga differently. Application contains yoga exercises for
* Beginners
* Intermediate
* Advanced
* Young, men, women and with respect to age as well.
Unique application contains following yoga poses


BEGINNERS :

Mountain pose
Downward Dog
Warrior
Tree Pose
Bridge Pose
Triangle Pose
Seated Twist
Cobra
Pigeon pose
Crow Pose
Child's pose

INTERMEDIATE :

Awkward chair pose
Bow pose
Camel pose
Cow face pose
cow pose
Dancer pose
Eagle pose
Extended Side angle
Fire Log Square pose
Fish pose
Four limbed staffpose
Headstand pose
Inverted plank pose
Lizard pose

ADVANCED :

One handed tree pose
Head to foot pose
wounded peacock
Formidable Face Pose
Scorpion Pose Variation
Destroyer Of The Universe Pose
Handstand Scorpion
Yoga Sleep Pose
Corpse Pose
Each category contains more than 50+ yoga classes for everyone.
Download and enjoy.
